vote.title: Authorize (1) a five-year master agreement for the purchase of ammunition and less than lethal supplies - GT Distributors, Inc. in the estimated amount of $6,666,650, lowest responsible bidder of two; and (2) a five-year master agreement for the purchase of ammunition and less than lethal supplies with GT Distributors, Inc. in the estimated amount of $1,004,069 and Proforce Marketing, Inc. dba Proforce Law Enforcement in the estimated amount of $102,500, through The Local Government Purchasing Cooperative (BuyBoard) agreement - Total estimated amount of $7,773,219 - Financing:  General Fund ($7,523,219) and El Centro Grant Fund ($250,000)
vote.description: Authorize (1) a five-year master agreement for the purchase of ammunition and less than lethal supplies - GT Distributors, Inc. in the estimated amount of $6,666,650, lowest responsible bidder of two; and (2) a five-year master agreement for the purchase of ammunition and less than lethal supplies with GT Distributors, Inc. in the estimated amount of $1,004,069 and Proforce Marketing, Inc. dba Proforce Law Enforcement in the estimated amount of $102,500, through The Local Government Purchasing Cooperative (BuyBoard) agreement - Total estimated amount of $7,773,219 - Financing:  General Fund ($7,523,219) and El Centro Grant Fund ($250,000)
